attributes.action: Make Pads and tampons for menstruation free!
attributes.additional_details: We never asked to be born and have periods, it’s not a choice for us and those young girls out there that are suffering daily without pads or tampons because of prices.
attributes.background: Us females want to be able to access sanitary towels (pads) and tampons for free, especially for those girls who are poor and can’t afford the prices of sanitary towels or tampons.
